experience.title: Android Developer
experience.description: Android application for multiplatform car rental portal ilCarro. Responsibilities included developing the application from scratch, fixing issues, adding and testing new features, and code deployment. Technologies used: RxJava2, LiveData, MVVM, Clean Architecture, Dagger2, Retrofit2, OkHttp, Google Maps, Cloudinary API, Picasso, Gson.

experience.title: Android Developer
experience.description: Mobile platform for AUDI E-Tron; refactored existing code, participated in embedded control system development, implemented and tested new functionalities, requirements checking, code deployment. Technologies: Android NDK, RxJava2, Dagger2, Retrofit2, JSON, MVP. Also worked on mobile system for malfunction detection module of gas turbine engine for military ship; observed and controlled parameters; technologies: Android NDK, C++, RxJava2, Dagger2, Retrofit2, JSON, MVP, MVVM, QNX, NPS, QT, CMake, DOORS, MKS.
